pr_title: Support itemService.getMetadata with virtual md field

timeline.bodyText: Can we update this test method to use Builder classes?  Currently, it does not appear to be cleaning up after itself.

timeline.bodyText: This file should now be renamed RelationshipMetadataServiceIT since it's been switched to an Integration Test instead of a Unit Test.

timeline.message: Rename after refactor RelationshipMetadataServiceTest => RelationshipMetadataServiceIT since it now inherits from AbstractIT class
